Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit - .NET Aspire 13 distributed application with task management

This .NET 10 Aspire application demonstrates:
- Distributed application architecture with AppHost orchestration
- API Service with task management and Redis caching endpoints
- Blazor web frontend with interactive server rendering
- Service discovery and resilience patterns
- Redis container integration for caching
- Comprehensive test coverage (unit, integration, E2E)
- OpenTelemetry instrumentation for observability

Features:
- Task CRUD operations with EF Core InMemory database
- Redis cache management UI
- Health check endpoints
- Development SSL certificate trust for service-to-service communication
- Aspire Dashboard for monitoring and debugging
